---

## Installation

```
pip install String-Extract
```

---

## Usage

```py
string = """Hi [Fayas](https://fayas.me),

How are you"""
```

```py
print(lines(string))  # For total lines
```

```py
print(spaces(string))  # For total spaces
```

```py
print(words(string))  # For total words
```

```py
print(links(string))  # For total links
```
